name: Tarot Thoth trainer
description:
This is a simulator for memorizing the Tarot cards of Thoth.
The value of this deck in the diversity of the characters that added in the image by Crowley. It is the symbolism of Tarot cards Thoth allows their use in a wide range of esoteric practices. In order for your intuitive search has not turned into wandering from one association to another, you need to have a precise representation about the basic values of each card in a particular position. This is a great amount of knowledge, which is difficult to remember and to keep in mind. To simplify the memorization of values and make this process dynamic use my trainer.
Values are divided into groups: basic, negative, values reveal the relationships, and the business sector. These groups can be studied separately.
The program is not for divination.
